summary: In this chapter, the author expresses profound gratitude to those who have supported him throughout the writing process of the book. He acknowledges the indispensable role of his wife Kristy, who has been his partner in every sense. The support from family and friends, along with the contributions of various editors and peers, significantly shaped the book. Special thanks are given to individuals whose insights on habits influenced his thinking. Ultimately, he emphasizes the value of community and shared experiences in the journey of writing. This chapter serves as a heartfelt tribute to everyone who contributed to the creation of the book.

slides.section_body: I owe my deepest gratitude to my wife, Kristy, who has been my rock and support throughout this journey. Her unwavering presence has enriched my writing experience significantly. Without her, this book might not exist.
slides.quote: My wife has played every role a person can play in the writing of a book.

slides.section_body: I am eternally grateful for the encouragement I received from my family. Their belief in me has fueled my motivation to complete this book. Knowing they are my greatest fans has been an invaluable source of strength.
slides.quote: It is a special feeling to know that your parents are your greatest fans.

slides.section_title: The Power of a Great Assistant
slides.section_body: A special thanks to my assistant, Lyndsey Nuckols, who has taken on countless roles in the creation of this book. Her extraordinary skills and talents have been vital to turning my vision into reality.
slides.quote: Some sections of this book are as much hers as they are mine.

slides.section_body: I must express my appreciation for the profound impact of authors like Leo Babauta, Charles Duhigg, Nir Eyal, and BJ Fogg, whose ideas on habits have shaped my thoughts. Their work is woven throughout the fabric of this book.
slides.quote: Their work and ideas can be found sprinkled throughout this text.

slides.section_body: The journey of writing has been enhanced by the guidance of several skilled editors. Their expertise transformed my rough drafts into a coherent and engaging manuscript.
slides.quote: I am indebted to those who transformed my ugly and insanely long first drafts.

slides.section_body: I appreciate all the early readers who provided feedback on the manuscript. Their insights were invaluable in refining my ideas and ensuring clarity in my writing.
slides.quote: The book benefited greatly from your feedback.

slides.section_body: A heartfelt thank you to the team at Penguin Random House, especially my publisher Megan Newman, for her patience and support in bringing this book to life. Their belief in my work has been fundamental.
slides.quote: Thank you for giving me the space I needed to create a book I was proud of.

slides.section_body: To the friends and family who checked in with me—a simple question, 'How’s the book going?' made all the difference during challenging times. Every kind word meant the world to me.
slides.quote: One kind word can be enough to get you to show up again the next day.

slides.section_body: I maintain an updated list of anyone who has influenced my thoughts meaningfully. Their contributions are part of my journey, and I strive to acknowledge their roles.
slides.quote: I keep an updated list of anyone who has influenced my thinking in meaningful ways.

slides.section_body: To you, the readers, thank you for sharing your precious time with me. Your willingness to engage with my work is deeply appreciated and inspires me to continue writing.
slides.quote: Life is short and you have shared some of your precious time with me by reading this book.
